Basketball Stars â€“ The Ultimate 2-Player Basketball Game!

Step onto the court with Basketball Stars, an action-packed basketball game by Madpuffers. Play solo or with a friend, showcasing your skills with famous basketball legends like LeBron James, James Harden, and Stephen Curry!

What is Basketball Stars?

Basketball Stars is a fast-paced, skill-based basketball game that lets you perform epic dunks, alley-oops, and three-pointers. Play in quick matches, team up with friends, or compete in tournament mode to become the ultimate champion.

How to Play Basketball Stars

  • Solo & Multiplayer Mode: Play alone or in 1v1 and 2v2 matches with friends.
  • Quick Match or Tournament: Choose between instant matches or a competitive tournament mode.
  • Master Special Skills: Each player has unique skills, including mega dunks and fast breaks.
  • Exciting Basketball Mechanics: Dribble, pass, and shoot like a pro.
  • Unblocked Version: Play Basketball Stars Unblocked on any device, hassle-free.

Features of Basketball Stars

  • 2-Player Basketball Game: Play solo or challenge a friend.
  • Famous Basketball Stars: Choose from a roster of legendary players.
  • Responsive Controls: Perform jump shots, blocks, and dunks with ease.
  • Unblocked Access: Play Basketball Stars Unblocked anywhere without restrictions.

Controls for Basketball Stars

1 Player Mode

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • X / L - Shoot / Steal
  • S - Pump / Block
  • A+A or D+D - Dash
  • K / Z - Super Shot

2 Player Mode

  • Player 1: WASD to move, B to shoot, S to block, A/D twice to dash, K to super shot
  • Player 2: Arrow keys to move, L to shoot, Down Arrow to block, Left/Right Arrow twice to dash, K to super shot

  • Basketball Legends 2020 - Another exciting game by MadPuffers.
